name: Check delivery of distribution board - Check for damage (paint finish, dimensions & door against drawing) - Please take a photo
Install sub mains cabling as appropriate (glands, tray & duct)
Install sub circuit & terminate (if circuit not complete at the other end, it must not be terminated)
Clean & vacuum area - please take a photo
Check switchboard as installed as per drawings
Check typed schedule for accuracy & install
Ensure switchboard cupboard & area is left clean - Please take a photo
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
